review.intent: Assess output quality through alignment scores, completion rates, failure rates, and sentiment, distinguishing statistically significant differences from noise.
focus: Verify alignment score significance level relative to Bonferroni correction and that the effect size is cited correctly
Check that failure rate claim correctly notes its statistical significance level relative to Bonferroni correction
Ensure satisfaction/dissatisfaction rate claims accurately reflect their statistical significance
Confirm sentiment and completion distribution bar widths match the underlying proportions

satisfaction-stat-tests.title: Full statistical test details for satisfaction metrics

prose.guidance: Present detailed statistical results for satisfaction metrics. Clearly distinguish which tests survive Bonferroni correction from those that are only marginally significant.

This section covers output quality and satisfaction metrics. For each metric, clearly distinguish Bonferroni-significant results from marginal or non-significant ones. Verify stat-card values and bar-fill widths match the data. The edit accuracy cross-reference in the final paragraph should match the Edit Accuracy section findings.
